price: To, kuma Ina rantsuwa da Ubangijin sama da ƙasã, lalle shĩ (abin da ake yi muku alkawari), haƙĩƙa gaskiya ne, kamar abin da kuka zamo kunã karantãwa na magana,
arabic: فَوَرَبِّ ٱلسَّمَآءِ وَٱلۡأَرۡضِ إِنَّهُۥ لَحَقّٞ مِّثۡلَ مَآ أَنَّكُمۡ تَنطِقُونَ

version.title: Hausa language - Abu Bakr Jomy
version.description: Translation of the Quran meanings into Hausa by Abu Bakr Mahmoud Jomy. Corrected by supervision of Rowwad Translation Center. The original translation is available for suggestions, continuous evaluation and development.

meta.transliteration: fawarabbi al-samāi wal-arḍi innahu laḥaqqun mith'la mā annakum tanṭiqūna
